title: 'Summoner Name Clean Up' Is wrong/misleading/inacurate

embed.description: Accounts that go unused for too long are susceptible to Summoner name decay. If an account hasn't played any games for a certain amount of time, their Summoner name will be flagged as available. Th...

body:
One of my friends who I 'gave' one of my old summoner names has been inactive for a solid 13 months and 11 days and according to the Summoner Name Clean Up article post by Riot. The name should be well available by now (the account is level 13)

I made a ticket about this and this is what a rioter told me to do.

"I understand you cannot tell me exactly when. But then should you not change the article or something?Because I understand it, and according to it. The name should be available is what i am saying"

"Greetings Summoner,

Thank you for the suggestion! I completely understand that you were misled by the information on the article. Unfortunately, we don't handle the editing here, nor are we able to pass feedback reports directly to the development team, but I recommend posting to the Boards. The team is always looking at the Boards to get a feel for what parts of the game or website players think could be improved."


"MATHS IS NOT MY STRONG POINT. COULD YOU MAKE AN EXAMPLE OF HOW INACTIVITY PROTECTION IS CALCULATED?
Levels 1-6: 6 months of inactivity immunity
Level 12: 1 year of immunity
Level 20: 1 year, 8 months of immunity
Level 30: 2 years, 6 months of immunity" Is what it says in the article


 The article is wrong and needs revision.

replies.body:
Hey Ill,

Thanks for reaching out here. As far as I'm aware, the system should be working properly, but I'm working with a colleague to look into this further in case there's a hiccup in it that we weren't aware of.

Just so I have all the context on this interaction with the Summoner Name Clean Up system; when you gave the Summoner Name, how did you do so? Also, when you tried to reclaim the Summoner Name, did you try to do it by getting a Name Change or by trying to claim it on a new account?

Keep in mind that new accounts cannot claim cleaned up Summoner Names.
I gave it just by changing to another one. And i tried through the store not with a new account
